Name: ArmaLite AR-10 “Super SASS” 7.62x51 Precision Marksman Rifle MOD1
Description: The ArmaLite AR-10 “Super SASS” modified for the first time using two or three-star precision marksman rifle modification template. The modification focuses on improving muzzle rise recovery speed, reducing recoil, enhancing stability during firing, and increasing human-machine efficiency. Repair costs are doubled compared to the original.
